snippet.title: Hide - Indie Horror Game by Andrew Shouldice
snippet.description:
Hide is a free indie game by Andrew Shouldice. It's a dark, atmospheric survival horror experience similar to Amnesia, albeit a lot shorter. Your main objective is to find 5 locations in the gloomy cold woods, accompanied by snow fall. Discovering each of the signs will bring you closer to enlightenment, literally. Can you survive the night?

Download: http://andrewshouldice.com/hide/
